LanguageData.TweaksGalore.MainCurrentPageDesc: Setting descriptions are in tooltips. The Searchbar only works for the currently selected page.\nYou will need to restart the game for many of these settings to take effect.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.SectionRestoredRestart: Tweaks Galore: '{0}' tweaks restored to defaults. Restart required to take full effect.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.IncidentControlBoolDesc: Allows control over the chances of incidents happening, even reducing them to zero, because why not. Incidents set to zero chance of happening may still be triggered through other means, so this doesn't always result in disabling them.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.PennedAnimalsBoolDesc: Allows control over which animals can be penned and how many days it takes for them to begin roaming if they are not in a pen.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.TitleDignifiedMeditationDes: If enabled, this title activates Dignified Meditation for the pawn, allowing them to meditate on a throne.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.TitleNoDisabledWorkDesc: If enabled, clears any disabled work from the title.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.TitleDisableBedroomReqsDesc: If enabled, clears any requirements for bedrooms from the title.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.TitleDisableThroneroomReqsD: If enabled, clears any requirements for thronerooms from the title.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.CannotDoThisWork: {0} is only capable of doing this work to a limited skill level.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.IsIncapableOfViolenceLower: {0} is non-violent and not assigned a weapon
LanguageData.TG_HunterLacksWeaponDesc: A hunter does not have a weapon.\n\nWhile they can still perform their job, it is highly recommended to give them a weapon.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.PawnTraderDesc: Traders from these factions are visiting the colony:\n\n{0}
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.DefaultsRestoredRestartRequ: Tweaks Galore: '{0}' tweaks restored to defaults. Restart required to take full effect.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.TechprintCountNote: The techprint count controls how many techprints are needed to fully unlock the research project. Setting to 0 means no tech prints will be needed.
LanguageData.TweaksGalore.TechprintNoFactions: No factions hold techprints for this research. If this is the default, it may be they are obtained through other means than Royalty typically uses.
